channel.title: [looking for contributor] css / logo refinement ; [update] main page css updates
channel.description:
[html]

lasko fixed the css on our main page. Looks now much better than before. Check it out: https://www.whonix.org

Thank you lasko!

lasko added our old logo to the main page. Could anyone refine it? https://www.whonix.org/forum/index.php/topic,209.0.html

There is still some work to do until Whonix gets a professional homepage comparable with for example https://www.torproject.org. We’re looking forward for further improvements. Are you interested to contribute?

[/html]
